description: Continued fraction for the Morse-Thue constant .01101001100101101001... formed from A010060.
mathematica: mt = 0; Do[ mt = ToString[ mt ] <> ToString[ (10^(2^n) - 1)/9 - ToExpression[ mt ] ], {n, 0, 7} ]; ContinuedFraction[ N[ ToExpression[ mt ]/10^(2^8), 2^8 ], 75 ]
crossrefs: More terms from _R. K. Guy_, Jun 15 2001
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 29 2000
